00026 #include <fstream>
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 #include <numeric>
00029 #include <string>
00030 #include <string.h>
00031 #include <vector>
00032 #include <cstdlib>
00033 #include "HDFIO.h"
00034 #include "ReadGadget.h"
00035 #include "SystemCharacteristics.h"
00036 
00037 /* \brief Write binary snapshot file to HDF5 */
00043 void 
00044 ExtractSnap( unsigned isnap ) {
00045   std::string SnapshotString = Snaps( isnap );
00046 
00047   std::cout << " * Getting particle numbers..." << std::endl;
00048   unsigned npart[ 6 ], ntot;
00049   unsigned id_min[ 6 ], id_max[ 6 ];
00050   double Redshift, Boxsize;
00051   double masses[ 6 ];
00052 
00053   std::string fn_snap = Folder("snaps") + SnapshotString;
00054   get_particle_number ( fn_snap.c_str(), id_min, id_max, masses, npart, ntot, Redshift, Boxsize );
00055   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00056 
00057   std::cout << " * offsets: ";
00058   unsigned offs[ 6 ];
00059   for ( int x = 0; x < 6; ++x ) {
00060     offs[ x ] = std::accumulate( &npart[ 0 ], &npart[ x ], 0 );
00061     std::cout << offs[ x ] << " ";
00062   }
00063   std::cout << std::endl;
00064 
00065   int n;
00066   unsigned * id;
00067   float * pos, * vel, * mass, * temp, * u, * rho;
00068 
00069   std::cout << "Allocating memory...";
00070   id   = ( unsigned * ) malloc( ntot * sizeof( unsigned ) );
00071   pos  = ( float * )    malloc( 3 * ntot * sizeof ( float ) );
00072   vel  = ( float * )    malloc( 3 * ntot * sizeof ( float ) );
00073   mass = ( float * )    malloc( ntot * sizeof( float ) );
00074   unsigned ngas = npart[0];
00075   temp = ( float * )    malloc( ngas * sizeof( float ) );
00076   u    = ( float * )    malloc( ngas * sizeof( float ) );
00077   rho  = ( float * )    malloc( ngas * sizeof( float ) );
00078   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00079 
00080   std::cout << "Reading data blocks..." << std::endl;
00081   FILE *SnapshotFile = 0;
00082 
00083   SnapshotFile = fopen ( fn_snap.c_str(), "r" );
00084   n = read_gadget_1( ( unsigned * ) id,   "ID  ", SnapshotFile );
00085   n = read_gadget_3( ( float * )    pos,  "POS ", SnapshotFile );
00086   n = read_gadget_3( ( float * )    vel,  "VEL ", SnapshotFile );
00087   n = read_gadget_1( ( float * )    mass, "MASS", SnapshotFile );
00088   n = read_gadget_1( ( float * )    temp, "TEMP", SnapshotFile );
00089   n = read_gadget_1( ( float * )    u,    "U   ", SnapshotFile );
00090   n = read_gadget_1( ( float * )    rho,  "RHO ", SnapshotFile );
00091   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl << std::endl;
00092 
00093   fclose ( SnapshotFile );
00094 
00095   std::cout << "Writing raw snapshot data into HDF5...";
00096   std::cout.flush();
00097   std::string now = "mkdir -p " + Folder("output") + SnapshotString;
00098   RunCommand( now );
00099   std::string fn_out = Folder("output") + SnapshotString + "/snapshot.hdf5";
00100   HDFCreateFile( fn_out );
00101   HDFCreateGroup( fn_out, "Header" );
00102   HDFWriteGroupAttribute( fn_out, "Header", "Boxsize", Boxsize );
00103   HDFWriteGroupAttribute( fn_out, "Header", "NumParticles", ntot );
00104   HDFWriteGroupAttribute( fn_out, "Header", "Redshift", Redshift );
00105   std::vector<float> rtype(ntot), rpos( 3 * ntot ), rvel( 3 * ntot ), rmass( ntot ), rid( ntot ), ru(ngas), rtemp(ngas), rrho(ngas);
00106 
00107   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < ntot; ++i, i3 = 3 * i ) {
00108     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00109       rpos.at( i3 + j ) = pos[ i3 + j ];
00110       rvel.at( i3 + j ) = vel[ i3 + j ];
00111     }
00112     rmass.at( i ) = mass[ i ];
00113     rid.at( i ) = id[ i ];
00114   }
00115   for(unsigned i=0; i<ngas; ++i){
00116     ru.at(i)=u[i];
00117     rtemp.at(i)=temp[i];
00118     rrho.at(i)=rho[i];
00119   }
00120 
00121   HDFWriteDatasetVector( fn_out, "Data_Pos",  rpos );
00122   HDFWriteDatasetVector( fn_out, "Data_Vel",  rvel );
00123   HDFWriteDataset( fn_out,       "Data_ID",   rid );
00124   HDFWriteDataset( fn_out,       "Data_Mass", rmass );
00125   HDFWriteDataset( fn_out,       "Data_U",    ru );
00126   HDFWriteDataset( fn_out,       "Data_Rho",  rrho );
00127   HDFWriteDataset( fn_out,       "Data_Temp", rtemp );
00128 
00129   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00130 }
